mapper.sql: id, title, exolian, remarks, investor_id, grade_id, apply_rule_id, corner, coupon_label, coupon_label_color, status, reason, code, cal_type, pay_type, created_by, created_by_name, created, updated_by, updated_by_name, updated

a.id,a.code,a.title,a.exolian, a.remarks,a.investor_id,a.grade_id, a.apply_rule_id, a.corner,a.coupon_label, a.coupon_label_color, a.STATUS, (case when a.STATUS=0 then '无效' when a.STATUS =1 then '有效' end) as status_name, a.reason,a.CODE, a.cal_type, (case when a.cal_type=1 then '订单' when a.cal_type=2 then '商品' end ) as cal_type_name, a.pay_type,a.created_by, a.created_by_name,a.created,a.updated_by,a.updated_by_name, a.updated,b.`name` as investor_name,c.`name` as grade_name, d.name as apply_rule_name, (case when d.apply_rule_type=1 then '通用券' when d.apply_rule_type=2 then '品牌券' when d.apply_rule_type=3 then '品类券' when d.apply_rule_type=4 then '商品券' end ) as apply_rule_type_name , d.apply_rule_type
mapper.select:
select
from coupon_template a left join coupon_investor b on a.investor_id = b.id left join coupon_grade c on a.grade_id = c.id left join coupon_apply d on a.apply_rule_id = d.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_template (id, title, exolian, remarks, investor_id, grade_id, apply_rule_id, corner, coupon_label, coupon_label_color, status, reason, code, cal_type, pay_type, created_by, created_by_name, created, updated_by, updated_by_name, updated ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exolian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{applyRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponLabelColor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update coupon_template
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exolian = #{exolian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
apply_rule_id = #{applyRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
corner = #{corner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_label = #{couponLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_label_color = #{couponLabelColor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cal_type = #{calType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update coupon_template set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exolian = #{exolian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, investor_id = #{investorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, apply_rule_id = #{applyRuleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, corner = #{corner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_label = #{couponLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_label_color = #{couponLabelColor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cal_type = #{calType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.store_id as storeId, b.template_id as templeteId, b.coupon_activity_id as couponActivityId, d.apply_rule_type as applyRuleType, f.reduced_type as reduceType, d.id as applyId, (case WHEN b.end_time < NOW() THEN 0 ELSE 1 end) expire, (case WHEN f.reduced_amt is null then 0 else f.reduced_amt end) as reduceAmt, (case WHEN f.cost is null then 0 else f.cost end) as cost, (case WHEN f.discounted is null then 0 else TRUNCATE((100-f.discounted)/10,2) end) as discounted, (case WHEN f.discounted_max_amt is null then 0 else f.discounted_max_amt end) as maxAmt, f.discounted_amt as discountedAmt, DATE_FORMAT(b.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as endTime FROM coupon_activity_store_customer a LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_template b ON a.coupon_activity_template_id = b.id LEFT JOIN coupon_template c on b.template_id = c.id AND c.`status` = 1 LEFT JOIN coupon_activity h on h.id = b.coupon_activity_id LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_record p on p.coupon_activity_id = b.coupon_activity_id LEFT JOIN coupon_apply d ON c.apply_rule_id = d.id AND d.`status` = 1 LEFT JOIN coupon_grade e on e.id = c.grade_id LEFT JOIN coupon_grade_detail f on c.grade_id = f.id WHERE a.store_id = #{storeId} and h.activity_status= 1 GROUP BY b.coupon_activity_id,templeteId ORDER BY expire DESC,startTime DESC

SELECT IFNULL(c.totalCount,0) AS totalCount, IFNULL(s.usedCount,0)AS usedCount, ca.id AS couponActivityId, cat.template_id as templeteId FROM coupon_activity ca LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_template cat ON cat.coupon_activity_id = ca.id and cat.`status`= 1 LEFT JOIN coupon_activity_store_customer d on d.coupon_activity_template_id = cat.id AND d.store_id =#{storeId} LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT car.id) totalCount,car.coupon_activity_id AS couponActivityId,car.template_id templeteId FROM coupon_activity_record car LEFT JOIN coupon_template_send cts ON cts.id = car.send_id WHERE car.customer_id IN
#{item}
GROUP BY cts.template_id) c ON c.couponActivityId=ca.id and c.templeteId=cat.template_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT cts.id) usedCount,car.coupon_activity_id couponActivityId,car.template_id templeteId FROM coupon_activity_record car LEFT JOIN coupon_template_use cts ON car.send_id=cts.send_id WHERE cts. STATUS = '1' AND car.customer_id IN
#{item}
GROUP BY cts.template_id) s
ON s.couponActivityId=ca.id and s.templeteId=cat.template_id
WHERE 1=1 AND ca.`status` = 1 AND ca.activity_status = 1 GROUP BY cat.coupon_activity_id,template_id
